Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    This is the interface class for GameBoard and holds the secondary methods as well as the prototypes for the other methods in GameBoard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean checkDiagWin​(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checkDiagWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 diagonal tokens in a diagonal left or right, returns true if so, false if not.
      default boolean checkForWin​(int c)
      checkIfWin checks to see if that last placed token results in 5 in a row, meaning there is a win
      boolean checkHorizWin​(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checkHorizWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 horizontal tokens in a row, returns true if so.
      boolean checkIfFree​(int c)
      checkIfFree checks to see if a column is available to place a token in.
      boolean checkTie()
      checkTie checks if the board is full and checkForWin is false, if so, then checkTie is true.
      boolean checkVertWin​(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checkVertWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 vertical tokens in a column, returns true if so.
      int getNumColumns()
      This functions returns max num of cols in game board.
      int getNumRows()
      This functions returns max num of rows in game board.
      int getNumToWin()
      This functions returns num of tokens in a row for win in game board.
      boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      isPlayerAtPos checks to see if player char is at pos, returns true if yes and false if not.
      void placeToken​(char p, int c)
      placeToken takes "p" (player token) and places it in "c" (column)
      char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
      whatsAtPos returns whatever character is currently at a given BoardPosition pos from cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfFree

        boolean checkIfFree​(int c)
        checkIfFree checks to see if a column is available to place a token in.
        Parameters:
        c - is the selected column
        Returns:
        True if the column has empty spaces, false if it is full.

      • placeToken

        void placeToken​(char p,
                int c)
        placeToken takes "p" (player token) and places it in "c" (column)
        Parameters:
        p - is the player token which is either 'X' or 'O'
        c - is the column number where the token will be placed

      • checkForWin

        default boolean checkForWin​(int c)
        checkIfWin checks to see if that last placed token results in 5 in a row, meaning there is a win
        Parameters:
        c - is a column on the board
        Returns:
        True if the last token placed causes a continuous line of 5 "p" tokens, and return false if not.

      • checkTie

        boolean checkTie()
        checkTie checks if the board is full and checkForWin is false, if so, then checkTie is true.
        Returns:
        True if the board is full and checkForWin is false, otherwise checkTie is false.

      • checkHorizWin

        boolean checkHorizWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                      char p)
        checkHorizWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 horizontal tokens in a row, returns true if so.
        Parameters:
        pos - is a board position from cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        p - is a player token (either "X" or "O")
        Returns:
        True if the last placed token results in 5 horizontal "p" tokens in a row, false if not.

      • checkVertWin

        boolean checkVertWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                     char p)
        checkVertWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 vertical tokens in a column, returns true if so.
        Parameters:
        pos - is a board position from cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        p - is a player token (either "X" or "O")
        Returns:
        True if the last placed token results in 5 vertical "p" tokens in a column, false if not.

      • checkDiagWin

        boolean checkDiagWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                     char p)
        checkDiagWin checks to see if the last token placed results in 5 diagonal tokens in a diagonal left or right, returns true if so, false if not.
        Parameters:
        pos - is a board position from cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        p - is a player token (either "X" or "O")
        Returns:
        True if the last placed token results in 5 vertical "p" tokens in a column, false if not.

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        whatsAtPos returns whatever character is currently at a given BoardPosition pos from cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        Parameters:
        pos - is a cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        Returns:
        The character that at pos (cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition)

      • isPlayerAtPos

        boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                      char player)
        isPlayerAtPos checks to see if player char is at pos, returns true if yes and false if not.
        Parameters:
        pos - is a cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.BoardPosition
        player - is a char
        Returns:
        True if "player" character is at pos, false if not.
